articles.title: Watch touching moment classy Thiago consoles Ruben Vargas after Switzerland ace missed penalty in Spain... - The Sun
articles.content:
SPAIN midfielder Thiago Alcantara showed his class after consoling Ruben Vargas following Switzerland's Euro 2020 exit.
